mapper.select: SELECT t3.username, t3.id FROM sys_role_menu t1 INNER JOIN sys_user_role t2 ON t1.role_id = t2.role_id AND t2.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN sys_user t3 ON t2.user_id = t3.id AND t3.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.menu_id = #{menuId}
SELECT DISTINCT t2.menu_id FROM sys_user_role t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t1.role_id = t2.role_id AND t2.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.user_id = #{userId}
